properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:24AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Flooding continues along portions of the Black Warrior
River...and flood warnings remain in effect on the Locust Fork
at Sayre and on the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  9:00 AM Thursday the stage was 97.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising back to near 100.7 feet
by Friday evening then begin falling.
* Impact...At 102 feet...Residential flooding begins in the area.
Numerous cabins and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become
flooded. At 98 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
